entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-02
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • APICompat tool fails to start #34405
  • Runtime list file was not found #33936
  • on win-arm64, Upgrade failed from net 6 RC1 to RC2 with error The installation path for ARM64 SDK installations: "C:\Program Files\dotnet" cannot be the same as for x64 SDK installations: "C:\Program Files\dotnet" #21872
  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web should default to TrimMode=full #30059
    .NET 8.0

Updated

  • File used by another process #33956
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Non-descriptive error on .NET Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers deploy DN8.P6 #34329
  • runtimeconfig.template.json not integrating properly in .NET 5.0 C++/CLI project #14698
    Discussion
  • Add .Net 6 for arm64 to snap store #23550
  • dotnet restore very slow on Azure pipelines #12445
  • Azure DevOps and GitHub Actions should warn when an old SDK is used #20250
  • Is it safe to delete older .NET runtimes? #18248
  • `dotnet run` help doesn't show help about `--urls` #34386
  • GenAPI cannot decode records when reading from metadata #32196
    8.0.1xx
  • [Feature Request] Add switch to 'dotnet restore' to ignore repo cert issues #14692
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Create default.json file #34414
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add feature switch to control XmlResolver.IsNetworkingEnabledByDefault #34412
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Allow MSBuild to use BinaryFormatter" #34402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • add test to test Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add implementation and test for the DisableRuntimeMarshalling attribute. #34388
    untriaged
  • Enable transitive pinning #34387
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Change prerelease label to servicing #34385
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reenable in-test timeout #33700
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix ApiCompat.Tool execution #34406
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Ensure GenAPI replaces init method body #34390
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #34376
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • First-run workload experience #34322
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Tool install global command: Download tool packages from nuget when installing global tools #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Container Build: multiple registry push, single archive for multiple tags, tar.gz file writing. #32132
    Area-Containers
  • One option for fixing the locked file issue in the test #34307
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • First pass at adopting CPM #34344
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [draft] Containers: implementation of OAuth2 #34237
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Enable "portable" RID graph when targeting .NET 8 and higher #34279
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #34379
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • When Hot Reload change fails to apply in the browser send full error … #33471
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
